attributes.action: Oppose the nomination by Donald Trump of Woody Johnson as ambassador to UK.
attributes.additional_details:
With little regard for the suffering of thousands of women and men damaged by Johnson & Johnson medical devices and the scandal of J&J baby products being linked as a cause of cancer, J&J are a far cry from the 'family' company they claim to be. 

We must oppose this appointment, and protect our rights against corporate greed and the dangers Trump and his team pose to all citizens.
attributes.background:
Trump has elected Woody Johnson as his chief fundraiser. 
As heir to the J&J fortune, and with a net worth of $3.5 billion, Trump continues to sell power and influence to those with the deepest pockets.
